pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Extension of 'Tidymodels' Supporting Offset Terms // Extend the 'tidymodels' ecosystem https://www.tidymodels.org/ to enable the creation of predictive models with offset terms. Models with offsets are most useful when working with count data or when fitting an adjustment model on top of an existing model with a prior expectation. The former situation is common in insurance where data is often weighted by exposures. The latter is common in life insurance where industry mortality tables are often used as a starting point for setting assumptions.
